get.description: The list with properties is not complete. You'll notice more properties then described in this document. Please only use the documented fields. **Undocumented fields can change or be deleted!**

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: filter results by the date the sale was created for export with format YYYY/MM/DD or YYYY-MM-DD - (Deprecated, use dateExportedSince)

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: filter results by the date the sale was last updated with format YYYY/MM/DD or YYYY-MM-DD

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

get.description: Retrieve sales data with pagination support. **Customer filter required**: When using page-based pagination (page parameter), you must provide either customerSourceId or customerTilroyId. When using lastId-based pagination (lastId parameter), customer filters are optional.

parameters.name: customer
parameters.description: filter results by customer sourceId (required when using page-based pagination, optional when using lastId pagination)

parameters.name: customerSourceId
parameters.description: filter results by customer sourceId (required when using page-based pagination, optional when using lastId pagination)

parameters.name: customerTilroyId
parameters.description: filter results by customer tilroyId (required when using page-based pagination, optional when using lastId pagination)

parameters.name: dateFrom
parameters.description: filter results by daterange (must be accompanied by dateTo), dates are in ISO format and only days are taken into account

parameters.name: dateTo
parameters.description: filter results by daterange (must be accompanied by dateFrom), dates are in ISO format and only days are taken into account

parameters.name: orderNumber
parameters.description: filter results by order number, requires customerTilroyId

parameters.name: excludeInvoiceLinks
parameters.description: exclude invoice.links array from the response to improve response times - when true, the invoice.links property will not be populated (default: false)

X-Paging-ItemsPerPage.description: number of max items returned per page.

X-Paging-ItemCount.description: total number of items over all pages.

Link.description: link header for pagination (only when using lastId parameter)

Link-json.description: JSON version of the link header for pagination (only when using lastId parameter)

put.summary: update a sale by tilroy id

post.summary: Set the loglevel for the service.

requestBody.description: The logging level type in the body of the request

count.name: count
count.description: max number of sales to be returned (default = 10, max = 100)

dateFrom.name: dateFrom
dateFrom.description: filter results by daterange (must be accompanied by dateTo), dates are in ISO format and only days are taken into account

queryDateExportedSince.name: dateExportedSince
queryDateExportedSince.description: filter results by the date the sale was created for export

dateTo.name: dateTo
dateTo.description: filter results by daterange (must be accompanied by dateFrom), dates are in ISO format and only days are taken into account

fields.name: fields
fields.description: filter out what you want returned for each sale by specifying one or more properties separated by a comma (ex. fields=idTilroySale,customer,shop.name)

returnPictureURL.name: returnPictureURL
returnPictureURL.description: add picture URL to sale line if line has picture. Possible values are: 'true' and 'false'

sorting.name: sorting
sorting.description: this is a comma seperated list in which you can define what fields you to sort by. Syntax is: 'sorting=field1:1,field2:-1,...'. Asc/Desc is specified by the value sign, 1 for asc., -1 for desc.

headerTilroyApiKey.name: Tilroy-Api-Key
headerTilroyApiKey.description: API key to identify and validate the tenant

page.name: page
page.description: page of results ot be returned (default = 1)

lastId.name: lastId
lastId.description: Enables cursor-based pagination using sale IDs. Use empty value (?lastId=) to start cursor pagination, then use the last sale ID from previous response for subsequent requests. Cannot be used together with page parameter. When used, only Link and Link-JSON headers are returned (no X-Paging-* headers).

status.description: I=Invoice, N=Normal, P=Periodically Invoiced, R=Ready for invoicing

transactionDiscountPercentage.description: transaction discount percentage for this sale

transactionDiscountAmount.description: transaction discount amount for this sale

basedOnSale.description: Reference to the original sale in case of duplicate for invoice

customerCreditsUsed.description: Customer credits used in this sale

sealNumber.description: seal sequence number of the sale in the shop. Used to calculate the seal

eTicket.description: E-Ticket was requested for this sale

ogoneReference.description: Ogone reference of the payment in case of web order

isVatInclusive.description: indicates if prices in sale are VAT inculsive or VAT exclusive

isPeriodicInvoicing.description: indicates this sale will be invoiced with periodical invoice

orderNumber.description: Reference to the web order number

isDispatch.description: Indicates this a dispatch sale for a web order

deliveryDate.description: Requested delivery date in case of web order

deliveryTrackingCode.description: Tracking code in case of home delivery

emailPickupPoint.description: Mail adress of the pickup point in case of delivery to a pickup point

vatExempt.description: indicates this is a sale that complies to the rules for VAT exemption

saleDate.description: Date of the sale in local time zone

timestamp.description: Date of the sale in UTC

vat.description: List of VAT for this sale, for each VAT percentage/VAT kind type

deliveryAddress.description: delivery address in case of home delivery order

basedOnSales.description: list of sales grouped to create this sale

eTicket.description: E-Ticket was requested for this sale

saleDate.description: Date of the sale in local time zone

vat.description: List of VAT for this sale, for each VAT percentage/VAT kind type

transactionDiscountPercentage.description: transaction discount percentage for this sale

basedOnSale.description: Reference to the original sale in case of duplicate for invoice

ogoneReference.description: Ogone reference of the payment in case of web order

emailPickupPoint.description: Mail adress of the pickup point in case of delivery to a pickup point

orderNumber.description: Reference to the web order number

isVatInclusive.description: indicates if prices in sale are VAT inculsive or VAT exclusive

isDispatch.description: Indicates this a dispatch sale for a web order

vatExempt.description: indicates this is a sale that complies to the rules for VAT exemption

isPeriodicInvoicing.description: indicates this sale will be invoiced with periodical invoice

transactionDiscountAmount.description: transaction discount amount for this sale

sealNumber.description: seal sequence number of the sale in the shop. Used to calculate the seal

timestamp.description: Date of the sale in UTC

collectShop.description: contains shop info in case of C&C order

standardPrice.description: standard price of the sku ordered

sellPrice.description: sell price of the sku ordered

paymentReference.description: reference of the voucher in case of advance, gift voucher, credit voucher, loyalty voucher

advanceReference.description: reference filled by user in case of manual advance

customerRequired.description: voucher can only be used by specified customer

status.description: I=Invoice, N=Normal, P=Periodically Invoiced, R=Ready for invoicing

cashDiscountDays.description: number of days cash discount is valid

isPeriodicInvoicing.description: Indicates if it is a grouped invoice (by month)

discount.description: applied discount for this sales line. Discount explains type of discount

standardPrice.description: standard price of the sku for the quantity of the line

manualPrice.description: manually modified price of the sku

idSaleLineReturned.description: reference of returned sale line in case of a return

isAdvance.description: line is the sale of an advance

orderId.description: Order id reference (order id depending on implementation)

orderLineId.description: Order line id reference  (order line id depending on implementation)

serialNumberSale.description: serial number registered on the sale

standardUnitPrice.description: standard price for one item of the sku

collectShop.description: contains shop info in case of C&C order

discountReason.description: line discount reason in case of discount with fixed discount reasons

sellPrice.description: sell price of the sku ordered

standardPrice.description: standard price of the sku ordered

CollectMethod.description: additional information in case of C&C or Home Delivery

ReturnReason.description: return reason in case of return

paymentReference.description: reference of the voucher in case of advance, gift voucher, credit voucher, loyalty voucher

advanceReference.description: reference filled by user in case of manual advance

customerRequired.description: voucher can only be used by specified customer

isUsed.description: voucher is actually applied in this sale, it is possible that voucher is scanned but not actually apllicable for this sale

runId.description: run where this voucher is used

activationId.description: activation where this voucher is used

description.description: description in the language of the sale
description in the language of the sale

nofDays.description: Numbers of days to pay the invoice

endOfMonth.description: in case true, nofDays starting from the end of the month, otherwise invoice date

description.description: description in the language of the sale

Error.description: The error object returned by the service

code.description: Code of the error, assigned by Node or the developer.

message.description: More information about the cause of the error.

warrantyDate.description: value to be in valid ISO 8601 date format

salePayload.description: The sale JSON in the body of the request

updateSalePayload.description: The sale update JSON in the body of the request

loglevel.description: The logging level type in the body of the request
